name: TERA: Item Pass
description:
The TERA Item Pass grants an exclusive item immediately upon purchase and then one item on the first Tuesday of each month starting in May 2018 through October 2018. Plus, a second item sent in October 2018 to close out the season, for a total of seven. 

The specifics of the items contained in the season pass are a surprise, but include the following:

•	Two mounts
•	Two costumes
•	One pet
•	One weapon skin
•	One bonus mystery item

The items associated with the season pass will be exclusive to season pass holders through October 2018 and will not be attainable by any other method.

This pass is only available for purchase until April 30, 2018.
